nodes.text: Vatok Tawr was a Human male Mandalorian. During Jaina Solo's training under Boba Fett, Tawr would spar against her on several occasions, and eventually grew fond of her. While on the mission to Nickel One to kill the Moff Council, he attacked Darth Caedus only to be impaled through his T-Visor by Caedus' lightsaber after attempting to disarm Caedus. He wore black and red armor.
